issue.title: DRC Terrain texture warps when gazebo camera viewpoint changes

content.raw: Here's the result of stereo_image_proc with DRCSim 1.1.0. As visible, the points for the Turtlebot and Pioneer are at a reasonable distance, while the heightmap terrain points are completely wrong. I strongly suspect that this is related to the strange shader applied to the terrain.
content.html: Here's the result of stereo_image_proc with DRCSim 1.1.0. As visible, the points for the Turtlebot and Pioneer are at a reasonable distance, while the heightmap terrain points are completely wrong. I strongly suspect that this is related to the strange shader applied to the terrain.
